properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach FL out 20 NM; Waters from Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from East Cape Sable to Chokoloskee FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 17 at 3:40PM EST until January 18 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast to east winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts to near 35
kt and seas 5 to 7 feet expected well offshore. Conditions
should gradually improve on Saturday. However, it is possible
that the advisory might need to be extended through Saturday
with upcoming updates.

* WHERE...Waters from Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach FL out 20 NM,
coastal waters from East Cape Sable to Chokoloskee FL out 20
NM, and waters from Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach FL from 20 to
60 NM.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 21 to 33 knots,
and/or seas 7 feet or greater, are expected to produce hazardous
marine conditions to small craft. Inexperienced mariners,
especially those operating smaller vessels should avoid
navigating in these conditions.

A sudden onset of rough seas may cause hazardous conditions,
which may occur suddenly at jetties and inlets. These conditions
could catch boaters by surprise. Boaters should use cautions when
entering or exiting the inlets and jetty areas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY
